description: Try our easy to follow Carrot Cake Slice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Carrot cake,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Sesame free,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Apple,Vegan,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Carrot Cake Slice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs Macro Organic brown flaxseed meal

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line a 20x20x5cm square baking tin with baking paper. In a small bowl combine flaxseed meal with 6 tbs warm water, then let stand for 5 minutes.
Place all ingredients in a food processor and process until smooth. Pour mixture into prepared baking tin and bake for 40-45 minutes or until a skewer inserted into the middle comes out clean.
